summary.span: 表示從數位板和手寫筆收集的單一資料點 (Data Point)。

span.span: Represents a single data point collected from the digitizer and stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A收集資料，當使用者輸入使用數位板的筆墨。A collects data when a user inputs ink using the digitizer. 因為潀糔蠮報告的資訊將視製造廠商，而內的屬性而有所不同，所以而有所不同。Because the information that a digitizer reports differs depending on the manufacturer, the properties within a can vary. 若要判斷屬性是否在，呼叫方法。To determine whether a property is in the , call the method. 屬性包含指定的屬性會在。The property contains a that specifies which properties are in the . 所有物件包含指定的屬性 （x，y） 座標，以及不足的壓力。All objects contain properties that specify the (x, y) coordinates, as well as the pressure. ## Examples 下列範例會取得屬性名稱和值為每個在。The following example gets property names and values for each in a . 這個範例假設有稱為`packetOutput`。This example assumes that there is a called `packetOutput`. [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pressureFactor` 必須介於 0 和 1 (含) 之間的值。`pressureFactor` must have a value between 0 and 1, inclusive. 值為 0 指出套用任何不足的壓力，而值為 1 表示最大的壓力總量會套用。A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied. 值為 0.5 表示 50%的最大的壓力套用時，並依此類推。A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立。The following example demonstrates how to create a . summary.span: 取得或設定一個介於 0 和 1 之間的值，這個值反映在建立 時手寫筆套用到數位板介面的壓力總量。

span.span: Value between 0 and 1 indicating the amount of pressure the stylus applies to the digitizer's surface as the is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性會以介於 0 和 1 之間的值。The value of the property is expressed as a value between 0 and 1. 值為 0 指出套用任何不足的壓力，而值為 1 表示最大的壓力總量會套用。A value of 0 indicates that no pressure is applied, while a value of 1 indicates that the maximum amount of pressure is applied. 值為 0.5 表示 50%的最大的壓力套用時，並依此類推。A value of 0.5 indicates that 50% of the maximum pressure is applied, and so on. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來擷取並顯示每個的壓力值中稱為`points`。The following example uses the property to retrieve and display the pressure value for each in a called `points`. 這個範例假設有稱為`packetOutput`。This example assumes that there is a called `packetOutput`.
